nodes.text: Geeda was a female Rodian merchant who lived on Coruscant during the Cold War. She had a shop down in the Old Galactic Market's Concourse Bazaar where she sold synthleather jackets.
Geeda appears in the BioWare MMORPG Star Wars: The Old Republic as an armor vendor in Coruscant's Old Galactic Market Concourse Bazaar.
